info.title: API 0.9
info.description: The current state of the original Vend API.

get.description:
**DEPRECATED** This endpoint has a 2.0 equivalent. We recommend using that instead.
Returns a paginated list of consignments.

parameters.name: since
parameters.description: If included, returns only items modified since the given time. The provided date and time should be in **UTC** and formatted according to **ISO 8601**.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The number of the page of results to be returned.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The size of the page of results to be returned.

get.description:
**DEPRECATED** This endpoint has a 2.0 equivalent. We recommend using that instead.\s\s
\s\s
Returns a single consignment with a given ID.

parameters.name: consignment_id
parameters.description: The ID of the consignment to get.

put.description: Updates a consignment with the given ID.

parameters.name: consignment_id
parameters.description: The ID of the consignment to get.

delete.description:
**DEPRECATED** This endpoint has a 2.0 equivalent. We recommend using that instead.
Deletes the consignment with a given ID.

parameters.name: consignment_id
parameters.description: The ID of the consignment to get.

get.description:
**DEPRECATED** This endpoint has a 2.0 equivalent. We recommend using that instead.
Returns a paginated list of consignment products.

parameters.name: consignment_id
parameters.description: The ID of a consignment to filter the items for. Shouldn't be used together with the `product_id` parameter.

parameters.name: product_id
parameters.description: The ID of a product to filter the items for. Shouldn't be used together with the `consignment_id` parameter.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The number of the page of results to be returned.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The size of the page of results to be returned.

post.description: Adds a new product to a consignment.

get.summary: Get a single consignment product by ID
get.description:
**DEPRECATED** This endpoint has a 2.0 equivalent. We recommend using that instead.
Returns a single consignment product.

parameters.name: consignment_product_id
parameters.description: The ID of the consignment to get.

parameters.name: consignment_product_id
parameters.description: The ID of the consignment to get.

delete.description:
**DEPRECATED** This endpoint has a 2.0 equivalent. We recommend using that instead.
Deletes an item from the consignment.

parameters.name: consignment_product_id
parameters.description: The ID of the consignment to get.

get.description:
**DEPRECATED** This endpoint has a 2.0 equivalent. We recommend using that instead.
Returns a paginated list of customers.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: If included, searches for customers with the given unique ID. The id option cannot be used with the `code` or `email` options.

parameters.name: code
parameters.description: If included, searches for customers with the given customer code. The code option cannot be used with id or email options.

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: If included, searches for customers with the given email address. This is an exact match search. The email option cannot be used with the id or code options.

parameters.name: since
parameters.description: If included, returns only items modified since the given time. The provided date and time should be in **UTC** and formatted according to **ISO 8601**.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The number of the page of results to be returned.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The size of the page of results to be returned.

post.description:
**DEPRECATED** This endpoint has a 2.0 equivalent. We recommend using that instead.
Returns a single new or updated customer object.

get.description:
**DEPRECATED** This endpoint has a 2.0 equivalent. We recommend using that instead.
Returns a non-paginated list of outlets.

**DEPRECATED** This endpoint has a 2.0 equivalent. We recommend using that instead.
Returns a non-paginated list of payment types.

**DEPRECATED** This endpoint has a 2.0 equivalent. We recommend using that instead.
Returns a paginated list of products.

parameters.name: order_by
parameters.description: Defines the attribute by which the query results should be ordered. One of: `id`(recommended), `updated_at`(default), name.

parameters.name: order_direction
parameters.description: Selects the order direction of the results returned. On of `ASC`(default), `DESC`.

parameters.name: since
parameters.description: If included, returns only items modified since the given time. The provided date and time should be in **UTC** and formatted according to **ISO 8601**.

parameters.name: active
parameters.description: If included, only active or inactive products will be returned. One of: '"0"' or '"1"'.

parameters.name: sku
parameters.description: If included, only the product with given sku will be returned. It may happen that there will be more products with the same sku. In this case all of them will be returned.

parameters.name: handle
parameters.description: If included, only products with given handle will be returned. This is useful for filtering all variants of a product, since all variants share the same handle.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The number of the page of results to be returned.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The size of the page of results to be returned.

parameters.name: deleted
parameters.description: Indicates whether deleted items should be included in the result.

post.description: Returns a single new or updated product object.

get.summary: Get a single product by ID
get.description:
**DEPRECATED** This endpoint has a 2.0 equivalent. We recommend using that instead.
Returns an array with a single product inside it.

parameters.name: product_id
parameters.description: An ID of an existing product.

parameters.name: product_id
parameters.description: An ID of an existing product.

get.description:
**DEPRECATED** This endpoint has a 2.0 equivalent. We recommend using that instead.
Returns a paginated list of register sales.

parameters.name: since
parameters.description: If included, returns only items modified since the given time. The provided date and time should be in **UTC** and formatted according to **ISO 8601**.

parameters.name: outlet_id
parameters.description: If included, returns only register sales made for the given outlet, identified by ID.

parameters.name: status[]
parameters.description: If included, returns only register sales in the given state. The status[] parameter may be used more than once; returned sales will be in any of the specified states.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The number of the page of results to be returned.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The size of the page of results to be returned.

post.summary: Create or update a register sale
post.description: Returns a single new or updated product object.

get.summary: Get a single register sale by ID
get.description:
**DEPRECATED** This endpoint has a 2.0 equivalent. We recommend using that instead.
Returns a single register sale with the given ID, in an array.

parameters.name: sale_id
parameters.description: An ID of an existing sale

get.description:
**DEPRECATED** This endpoint has a 2.0 equivalent. We recommend using that instead.
Returns a non-paginated list of registers.

parameters.name: deleted
parameters.description: Indicates whether deleted items should be included in the result.

get.description:
**DEPRECATED** This endpoint has a 2.0 equivalent. We recommend using that instead.
Returns a paginated list of suppliers.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The number of the page of results to be returned.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The size of the page of results to be returned.

get.summary: Get a single supplier by ID
get.description:
**DEPRECATED** This endpoint has a 2.0 equivalent. We recommend using that instead.
Returns a single supplier with the given ID.

parameters.name: supplier_id
parameters.description: An ID of an existing supplier object

delete.description: Deletes a single supplier by ID.

parameters.name: supplier_id
parameters.description: An ID of an existing supplier object

get.description:
**DEPRECATED** This endpoint has a 2.0 equivalent. We recommend using that instead.
Returns a non-paginated list of taxes.

get.summary: Get a single tax by ID
get.description: Returns a single tax with the given ID.

parameters.name: tax_id
parameters.description: An ID of an existing tax object.

get.description:
**DEPRECATED** This endpoint has a 2.0 equivalent. We recommend using that instead.
Returns a non-paginated list of users.
Returns a list of webhooks.  *__NOTE:__ This endpoint will only return webhooks created by the application which is making the request.*

post.description:
Creates and returns a new webhook.
__NOTE:__ The `Content-Type` header for this request should be set to `application/x-www-form-urlencoded`.

parameters.name: data
parameters.description:
The value of this field should be set as a string representing a JSON payload like:
`{"url":"http://123456.ngrok.io","active":true,"type":"product.update"}`

get.summary: Get a single webhook by ID
get.description: Returns a single webhooks with the given ID.

put.description:
Updates a webhook with the given `id`.
__NOTE:__ The `Content-Type` header for this request should be set to `application/x-www-form-urlencoded`.

parameters.name: data
parameters.description:
The value of this field should be set as a string representing a JSON payload like:
`{"url":"http://123456.ngrok.io","active":true,"type":"product.update"}`

delete.description: Deletes the webhook with the given ID.

retailer_id.description: The ID of the retailer associated with this consignment.

consignment_date.description: The date when the consignment was created.

due_at.description: The due date for the consignment.

received_at.description: The date when the consignment was received.

outlet_id.description: The ID of the outlet to which the goods are coming.

supplier_id.description: The ID of the supplier associated with this consignment.

source_outlet_id.description: The ID of the outlet from which the goods are coming. Only used for stock transfers.

status.description: Status of the consignment. One of: `OPEN`, `SENT`, `RECEIVED`, `CANCELLED`,  `STOCKTAKE`, `STOCKTAKE_COMPLETE`.

type.description: The type of the consignment. One of:  `SUPPLIER`, `OUTLET`, `STOCKTAKE`.

accounts_transaction_id.description: The ID of a transaction in an external system associated with this consignment.

consignment_date.description: The date when the consignment was created.

due_at.description: The due date for the consignment.

received_at.description: The date when the consignment was received.

outlet_id.description: The ID of the outlet to which the goods are coming.

supplier_id.description: The ID of the supplier associated with this consignment.

source_outlet_id.description: The ID of the outlet from which the goods are coming. Only used for stock transfers.

status.description: Status of the consignment. One of: `OPEN`, `SENT`, `RECEIVED`, `CANCELLED`,  `STOCKTAKE`, `STOCKTAKE_COMPLETE`.

type.description: The type of the consignment. One of:  `SUPPLIER`, `OUTLET`, `STOCKTAKE`.

accounts_transaction_id.description: The ID of a transaction in an external system associated with this consignment.

results.description: Total amount of objects matching the query.

pages.description: The total amount of pages to iterate through.

consignment_id.description: The ID of the consignment associated with this item.

product_id.description: The ID of the product associated with this item.

count.description: Quantity "ordered" for stock orders or "expected" for stock takes.

received.description: Quantity "received" for stock orders or "counted" for stock takes.

cost.description: Supply cost of the item for this consignment.

sequence_number.description: Sequence order number for the item.

consignment_id.description: The ID of the consignment associated with this item.

product_id.description: The ID of the product associated with this item.

count.description: Quantity "ordered" for stock orders or "expected" for stock takes.

received.description: Quantity "received" for stock orders or "counted" for stock takes.

cost.description: Supply cost of the item for this consignment.

sequence_number.description: Sequence order number for the item.

consignment_products.description: An array of consignment product objects.

customer_group_name.description: The name of the customer group this customer is associated with.

customer_group_id.description: The ID of the customer group this customer is associated with.

enable_loyalty.description: Indicates whether customer's purchases should incur loyalty. `0` or `1`.

custom_field_1.description: Custom field 1, able to store any data as a string.

custom_field_2.description: Custom field 2, able to store any data as a string.

custom_field_3.description: Custom field 3, able to store any data as a string.

custom_field_4.description: Custom field 4, able to store any data as a string.

customer_group_id.description: The ID of the customer group this customer is associated with.

enable_loyalty.description: Indicates whether customer's purchases should incur loyalty. `0` or `1`.

custom_field_1.description: Custom field 1, able to store any data as a string.

custom_field_2.description: Custom field 2, able to store any data as a string.

custom_field_3.description: Custom field 3, able to store any data as a string.

custom_field_4.description: Custom field 4, able to store any data as a string.

outlet_id.description: The ID of the outlet to which the goods are coming.

count.description: Quantity "ordered" for stock orders or "expected" for stock takes.

reorder_point.description: Quantity below which the product should be included in the auto-filled stock orders.

restock_level.description: The default of the quantity for auto-filled stock orders

original.description: The URL of the product image in the original size (max 2000px).

standard.description: The URL of the product image in the standard size.

thumb.description: The URL of the product image in the thumbnail size.

time_zone.description: Outlet time-zone in **tz database** format like: `Pacific/Auckland`.

tax_id.description: The ID of the default tax for the outlet.

GenericContact.description: Generic contact object embedded in other objects like outlet or supplier

url.description: The URL of an external gateway.

payment_type_id.description: **internal** The ID of the global payment type.

PaymentConfig.description: An object containing additional payment configuration attributes

payment_types.description: An array of payment type objects

product_id.description: The ID of the product associated with this item.

price_book_id.description: ID of the price book associated with this record.

price_book_name.description: The name of the price book associated with this record.

type.description: The type of the consignment. One of:  `SUPPLIER`, `OUTLET`, `STOCKTAKE`.

outlet_id.description: The ID of the outlet to which the goods are coming.

customer_group_name.description: The name of the customer group this customer is associated with.

customer_group_id.description: The ID of the customer group this customer is associated with.

price.description: Tax exclusive price of the product.

tax_id.description: The ID of the default tax for the outlet.

tax_name.description: The name of the tax associated with this record.

min_units.description: Minimum product quantity for which this price book entry will be used.

max_units.description: Maximum product quantity for which this price book entry will be used.

valid_from.description: The staring date from which this price book entry is in effect.

valid_to.description: The end date to which this price book entry is in effect.

has_variants.description: Indicated whether the product has variants.

variant_parent_id.description: The ID of the parent product. Only available of variant children.

base_name.description: The root of the product's name as defined by the user in the UI. Doesn't include any variant related suffixes.

image_large.description: **DEPRECATED** URL of the large product image.

price_book_entries.description: An array of price book entries associated with the product.

price.description: Tax exclusive price of the product.

tax_name.description: The name of the tax associated with this record.

taxes.description: An array of product tax objects.

source_id.description: The ID that can be used to reference a product in another system.

variant_source_id.description: Reference ID to an external object. Should be POSTed as `source_variant_id`.

handle.description: The handle of the product. Creating a new product with a handle identical to one of an existing product will cause creating a variant.

type.description: The type of the consignment. One of:  `SUPPLIER`, `OUTLET`, `STOCKTAKE`.

variant_option_one_name.description: The name of the variant option 1.

variant_option_one_value.description: The value of the variant option 1.

variant_option_two_name.description: The name of the variant option 2.

variant_option_two_value.description: The value of the variant option 2.

variant_option_three_name.description: The name of the variant option 3.

variant_option_three_value.description: The value of the variant option 3.

active.description: Indicates whether the product is currently active.

description.description: The description of the product. May include HTML.

sku.description: The SKU of the product. Should be unique for new products.

tags.description: A comma separated list of tags associated with the product.

brand_id.description: The ID of the brand associated with the product.

supplier_code.description: The code of the supplier for the product.

supply_price.description: The default cost of supply for the product.

account_code_purchase.description: Code used to associate purchase (cost) of the product with a specific account.

account_code_sales.description: Code used to associate sales of the product with a specific account. When POSTing it should be delivered as `account_code`.

track_inventory.description: Indicated whether the system should track inventory count for this product.

button_order.description: A number describing the position of a variant in the UI.

inventory.description: A list of inventory records associated with the product.

retail_price.description: Retail price for the product. Tax inclusive or exclusive depending on the store settings.

tax_id.description: The ID of the default tax for the outlet.

outlet_id.description: The ID of the outlet to which the goods are coming.

tax_id.description: The ID of the default tax for the outlet.

source_id.description: The ID that can be used to reference a product in another system.

source_variant_id.description: Reference ID to an external object. Value will be returned as `variant_source_id`.

handle.description: The handle of the product. Creating a new product with a handle identical to one of an existing product will cause creating a variant.

type.description: The type of the consignment. One of:  `SUPPLIER`, `OUTLET`, `STOCKTAKE`.

variant_option_one_name.description: The name of the variant option 1.

variant_option_one_value.description: The value of the variant option 1.

variant_option_two_name.description: The name of the variant option 2.

variant_option_two_value.description: The value of the variant option 2.

variant_option_three_name.description: The name of the variant option 3.

variant_option_three_value.description: The value of the variant option 3.

active.description:
Indicates whether the product is currently active.
**NOTE:** Currently has to be submitted as __"0"__ or __"1"__. Will be returned as __boolean__ value of `true` or `false`.

description.description: The description of the product. May include HTML.

sku.description: The SKU of the product. Should be unique for new products.

tags.description: A comma separated list of tags associated with the product.

brand_name.description: The name of the brand associated with the product.

supplier_code.description: The code of the supplier for the product.

supply_price.description: The default cost of supply for the product.

account_code_purchase.description: Code used to associate purchase (cost) of the product with a specific account.

account_code.description: Code used to associate sales of the product with a specific account. Value will be returned as `account_code_sales`.

track_inventory.description: Indicated whether the system should track inventory count for this product.

button_order.description: A number describing the position of a variant in the UI.

inventory.description: A list of inventory records associated with the product.

retail_price.description: Retail price for the product. Tax inclusive or exclusive depending on the store settings.

tax_id.description: The ID of the default tax for the outlet.

rate.description: The value of the tax rate. `0.1 = 10%` tax.

outlet_id.description: The ID of the outlet to which the goods are coming.

button_layout_id.description: **internal** The ID of the button layout associated with this register.

print_receipt.description: Indicates whether the receipt will be printed after the sale is completed. `"0"` or `"1"`.

email_receipt.description: Indicated whether the receipt should be emailed after the sale is completed.  `"0"` or `"1"`.

ask_for_note_on_save.description: Indicates whether the user will be asked to enter a note when saving a sale.  `"0"` or `"1"`.

print_note_on_receipt.description: Indicates whether the sale note should be printed on the receipt.  `"0"` or `"1"`.

ask_for_user_on_sale.description: Indicated whether the user prompt should appear after the sale. `"0"` or `"1"`.

show_discounts_on_receipt.description: Indicates whether discounts values should appear on the receipt. `"0"` or `"1"`.

receipt_header.description: Content of the receipt header. May contain HTML.

receipt_barcoded.description: Indicates whether the barcode should be printed on the receipt. `"0"` or `"1"`.

receipt_footer.description: Content of the receipt footer. May contain HTML.

invoice_prefix.description: Text to be used as prefix of the invoice number.

invoice_suffix.description: Text to be used as suffix of the invoice number.

invoice_sequence.description: The numeric part of the last created invoice number.

register_open_count_sequence.description: **internal** The number of the current register closure.

register_open_sequence_id.description: **internal** The ID of the current register closure.

register_open_time.description: The time when the register was opened.

register_close_time.description: Time time when the register was closed. May be blank if the register is currently open.

cash_managed_payment_type_id.description: **internal** The ID of the payment type used for cash management functionality.

is_quick_keys_enabled.description: **internal** Indicated whether the register is using quick keys.

quick_key_template_id.description: **internal** The ID of the quick keys template the register is using.

customer_name.description: The name of the customer associated with the sale.

user_name.description: The username of the user who created the sale.

created_at.description: The date and time when the sale was created (on the server).

tax_name.description: The name of the tax associated with this record.

return_for.description: The ID of another sale if this sale was created as a return.

source_id.description: The ID that can be used to reference a product in another system.

register_id.description: The ID of the register where the sale was created.

customer_id.description: The ID of the customer associated with this sale.

user_id.description: The ID of the user (cashier) who created the sale.

sale_date.description: The date of the sale. If not provided will be added as the time the sale reached the server.

status.description: Status of the consignment. One of: `OPEN`, `SENT`, `RECEIVED`, `CANCELLED`,  `STOCKTAKE`, `STOCKTAKE_COMPLETE`.

short_code.description: Short, unique code to be printed on the receipt for loyalty tracking purposes.

invoice_number.description: The invoice number for the sale. If left null it will be populated by Vend with the next available invoice number.

accounts_transaction_id.description: The ID of a transaction in an external system associated with this consignment.

taxes.description: An array of product tax objects.

register_sales.description: An array of register sale objects.

register_id.description: The ID of the register where the sale was created.

retailer_payment_type_id.description: Payment type id to be used for the payment.

payment_date.description: The date and time of the payment.

payment_type_id.description: **internal** Global payment type ID. Irrelevant for external use.

label.description: The label of the payment type.

register_id.description: The ID of the register where the sale was created.

retailer_payment_type_id.description: Payment type id to be used for the payment.

payment_date.description: The date and time of the payment.

handle.description: The handle of the product. Creating a new product with a handle identical to one of an existing product will cause creating a variant.

sku.description: The SKU of the product. Should be unique for new products.

tax_name.description: The name of the tax associated with this record.

tax_total.description: Total tax for this line item. (`tax * quantity`).

price_total.description: Total price for this line item. (`price * quantity`).

product_id.description: The ID of the product associated with this item.

register_id.description: The ID of the register where the sale was created.

sequence.description: Order number of the line item.

quantity.description: Quantity of products for the line item.

price.description: Tax exclusive price of the product.

cost.description: Unit cost of the line item

price_set.description: Indicated whether the price was "fixed". If set to `"1"` it prevents recalculation of the total price based on the price from the database. One of `"0"` or `"1"`.

discount.description: Discount value of the line item.

tax_id.description: The ID of the default tax for the outlet.

status.description: Status of the consignment. One of: `OPEN`, `SENT`, `RECEIVED`, `CANCELLED`,  `STOCKTAKE`, `STOCKTAKE_COMPLETE`.

product_id.description: The ID of the product associated with this item.

register_id.description: The ID of the register where the sale was created.

sequence.description: Order number of the line item.

quantity.description: Quantity of products for the line item.

price.description: Tax exclusive price of the product.

cost.description: Unit cost of the line item

price_set.description: Indicated whether the price was "fixed". If set to `"1"` it prevents recalculation of the total price based on the price from the database. One of `"0"` or `"1"`.

discount.description: Discount value of the line item.

tax_id.description: The ID of the default tax for the outlet.

status.description: Status of the consignment. One of: `OPEN`, `SENT`, `RECEIVED`, `CANCELLED`,  `STOCKTAKE`, `STOCKTAKE_COMPLETE`.

rate.description: The value of the tax rate. `0.1 = 10%` tax.

total_payment.description: Total payment value for the sale.

source_id.description: The ID that can be used to reference a product in another system.

register_id.description: The ID of the register where the sale was created.

customer_id.description: The ID of the customer associated with this sale.

user_id.description: The ID of the user (cashier) who created the sale.

sale_date.description: The date of the sale. If not provided will be added as the time the sale reached the server.

status.description: Status of the consignment. One of: `OPEN`, `SENT`, `RECEIVED`, `CANCELLED`,  `STOCKTAKE`, `STOCKTAKE_COMPLETE`.

short_code.description: Short, unique code to be printed on the receipt for loyalty tracking purposes.

invoice_number.description: The invoice number for the sale. If left null it will be populated by Vend with the next available invoice number.

accounts_transaction_id.description: The ID of a transaction in an external system associated with this consignment.

description.description: The description of the product. May include HTML.

GenericContact.description: Generic contact object embedded in other objects like outlet or supplier

description.description: The description of the product. May include HTML.

GenericContact.description: Generic contact object embedded in other objects like outlet or supplier

default.description: Indicates whether the tax is the default tax for the account.

active.description: Indicates whether the product is currently active.

rates.description: Tax rates associated with the tax. Always a single rate for tax-inclusive stores.

rate.description: The value of the tax rate. `0.1 = 10%` tax.
The value of the tax rate. `0.1 = 10%` tax.

username.description: The username used to log into Vend.

outlet_id.description: The ID of the outlet to which the goods are coming.

outlet_ids.description: An array of outlet IDs that the user is assigned to

retailer_id.description: The ID of the retailer associated with this consignment.
